Issue.summary: RSA signature validation vulnerability in jsrsasign <10.2.0
Issue.description: =2.1.1-snapshot.390 Depends on vulnerable versions of jsrsasign node_modules/fabric-common fabric-network >=1.4.19-snapshot.1 Depends on vulnerable versions of fabric-common node_modules/fabric-network {code} Appears to be similar to https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FABN-1568 but they are not the same as far as I can tell. >
